course_name: Product Management
description: This course is designed to enhance the skills to become effective Product Manager and design the successful product. Each phase of Product Management life-cycle is explained in detailed along with the contribution of Product Manager in each phase. The course includes the tips for designing successful product, effective ways of writing requirements, releasing the product to the market and analyzing the metrics of product sales for preparing effective product strategy and roadmap.

instructor: MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance
course_name: Professional Diploma in Agile Product Management
description: Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Agile Product Management by MTF Institute. Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance. MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance. MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things. MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry. MTF is present in 216 countries and has been chosen by more than 710 000 students. The course includes 2 modules: 1. Agile and Flexible Management Approaches, Project Management 2. Product Management.
